name: Mr. Swing King
description:
Mr. Swing king is a platformer game about swinging.
Mr. Swing king is a stick figure, who set out to find the secret balloon level.  can you find it?

Made by three programmers, so excuse the "art".

Everything was made in three days for the Wowie 2.0 2020 Jam.
Scripts, Models, Sound, Effects, Music, Levels, Graphics.
The only thing we did NOT make by ourselves is the famous WOWIE Call!

There are some bugs in the game. You should probably try to use them to YOUR advantage!

The game can be completed. A text will notify when all levels has been cleared. If you get stuck, use the ESC/Start button to use the level picker, though you will not get to the final level if any levels are skipped. 

WE WOULD LOVE TO HEAR YOUR THOUGHT ABOUT THE GAME!
Have fun

~ The Developers

--------------------------------- CONTROLS ------------------------------------------

Keyboard & Mouse                        

WALK - A/D-Buttons
JUMP - SPACE
SHOOT - LMB
RESET - R-BUTTON
AIM - MOUSE
MENU - ESC

GAMEPAD

WALK - LEFT STICK
JUMP - (A/LEFT-TRIGGER)/CROSS
SHOOT - RIGHT-TRIGGER
RESET - Y/TRIANGLE
AIM - RIGHT STICK
MENU -  START
